token_2022.name: Token-2022 Program
token_2022.description: Solana Program Library's advanced token program with extensions like Transfer Hooks.

amms.name: Raydium
amms.description: On-chain order book AMM with CPMM support for Token-2022, but no native Transfer Hook support.

notes.transfer_hooks: Token-2022 Transfer Hooks allow custom logic during transfers but are not yet supported by major AMMs, requiring custom integration or new AMM development.
notes.development_resources: Use Anchor for Solana smart contracts, TypeScript for UI/SDK, and Solana Program Library for token interactions.
